122.title: The Man gets Big

123.content:
Becky’s thought process was interrupted by a voice with a thick Australian accent behind her saying “Um, excuse me, Miss Lynch?” Becky immediately spins around in surprise and sees a girl in black and gold trunks, long wavy black hair, standing an inch or two taller than herself. Still flustered she goes “Uh yeah. That’s… that’s me, I’m Becky Lynch and you are…” The girl holds out a hand for a handshake and goes “Uh, it’s Indi actually. Indi Hartwell.” Becky takes the handshake while hiding her other hand quickly behind her back to conceal the remote. “Ah yeah… Indi, huh? What can i do for you, Indi?” The younger wrestler stands at attention and tries to collect her thoughts, clearly nervous and she says “Well, i just had my first match with the company and… and i was wondering if you could give me any advice?” Becky looked around the locker room and didn’t see another soul in sight. A wicked smile came across her face as she realized that with someone this inexperienced and unknown in the locker room, nobody would really notice if she went missing for a little while. “Yeah sure, i can give you some advice. First thing you should know is to always expect the unexpected.” Indi looks at Becky with a look of confusion that turns to surprise when Becky pulls the remote out from behind her back and shoots her square in the chest. A beam of energy shoots out of the remote and surrounds Indi’s entire body, coating it in a small layer of tingling energy. Within a matter of seconds, Indi has dwindled down to a minuscule 4 inches tall, and is looking up at a now building-sized Becky Lynch! She starts to back away from Becky’s imposing figure, just as the giant redhead crouches down overhead and says “WEREN’T EXPECTING THAT, NOW WERE YA?”

Becky reaches down with her free hand, intent on grabbing the shrunken girl, but Indi reacts quickly and as Becky’s fingers start to circle around her, she leaps over the opposing appendages and tucks into a roll, attempting to escape from her clutches. Becky lets out a laugh of surprise and says “HA! OH, YOU’RE A FEISTY LITTLE DOLLY, AINT YA? GO AHEAD AND RUN, YOU WON’T GET TOO FAR WITH THEM LITTLE LEGS OF YOURS!” Indi doesn’t heed her advice and continues on running aimlessly around the locker room, looking for some sort of escape. She sees a door on the far side of the room, and sprints towards it, but she isn’t fast enough as Becky’s boots come thundering behind her, effortlessly catching up to her. A shadow comes over Indi’s whole body and she can only squeal in frustration as Becky’s fingers close around her, trapping her in a warm tight fist. Becky lifts her up off the ground, basking in the feeling of another human caught squirming between her fingers as she brings her up to eye level. “HAVE TO SAY, INDI. THAT WAS FAIRLY... ‘IMPRESSIVE’. GUESS THEY DIDN’T JUST HIRE YOU FOR YOUR LOOKS, ALTHOUGH YOU ARE PRETTY CUTE AT THAT SIZE.” Taking a free finger from her other hand and stroking Indi’s exposed head, Becky is loving the feeling of power she has over the helpless little woman in her grasp. Indi on the other hand is terrified, crying openly at the feeling of being held captive by a thousand foot tall woman who’s nonchalantly playing with her like a little doll. Becky bends over and places the shrunken woman back on the ground relatively gently, rising back up to her full height with her hands on her hips. “WELL I COULD STAY AND PLAY WITH YOU ALL DAY, LITTLE INDI. UNFORTUNATELY PLAYTIME WITH YOU HAS COME TO AN END. SAY BYE BYE!” Indi looks up in horror as Becky starts to slowly raise her foot off of the ground and hover it over her miniature body. She instinctively holds her arms up and cowers into a crouch, screaming with her eyes closed “No! Please! Don’t crush me Becky, Please!!!” But she doesn’t feel the pain and pressure of the giantess stomping her life out. Instead she just feels a beam of energy surrounding her whole body, just like before when she was shrunk down in the first place.

Indi opens her eyes and to her ultimate surprise, she’s not dead. She’s in a normal sized room, with a normal sized Becky standing right in front of her, still holding the remote that shrunk her in her hand. Indi can’t even get the words out to ask what happened, and Becky just walks right up to her and puts a hand on her shoulder. “So anyway, the rest of that advice i promised. Here it is. Tell anyone about what just happened, and i’ll come after you. I’ll shrink you again. And next time i actually will squash you like a bug. Understand?” Indi wordlessly nods her head up and down, before grabbing her things and leaving, tears streaming down her face. Becky was glad to get a demonstration of just how the size changing works on people, and just like she had hoped, it works like a charm. She looks at the remote in her hands and toys around with it for a bit, seeing just how big and small she can make things. A few thoughts immediately cross her mind like growing to the size of a mountain and crushing this whole arena under her shoe. On the other side of the spectrum if she ever comes face to face with Ronda again, she’ll have no problem making her as small as a grain of sand, leaving her to blow away in the dust. She looks at the match card for the night and sees that she’s got a match coming up later in the evening against none other than Nia Jax. But the show’s just started and she doesn’t need to compete for another hour or two. “Looks like i’ve got some time to kill. Let’s go have some fun.” Knowing where she wants to head first, she goes to another part of the locker room to meet up with...

13.content:
The Smackdown women's champ was just finishing up for the night, waiting for Sasha to come back with news on where they were staying for the night, when she came across the strange looking remote on the floor by her locker. She puts down her belt on the ground and picks it up to investigate it, looking over it's simple looking controls and the note that was attached to it. "Big Impact? Small Impact? I'm already the champion, what more of an impact do i have to make?" Without a care in the world, Bayley drops the remote down by her feet, ignoring it entirely as it makes a slight smacking sound upon hitting the floor. All of a sudden she feels a surge of energy pulsing through her body as she says “Whoa… what’s… going on…” The last few words echo from her lips a bit louder and deeper than her normal speech, and she feels her head bump against something hard as the feeling subsides. When all is said and done, Her head is level with the ceiling a good 15 feet high, and she’s looking around at a much MUCH smaller lookign locker room. “OH WOW… I’M SO BIG! HOW… HOW DID THIS HAPPEN?” Putting two and two together she looks down at her feet and right beside her left shoe, she can see the remote she dropped on the floor pointing right in her direction. “OH… OH MAN, THAT’S WHAT THEY MEANT BY IMPACT…” She takes a step away from the remote to bend down and look at it, but when she goes to put her foot down, she notices her boot goes into the floor, almost like it was made of a softer material. She bites her lip and lifts her heel up, exposing a huge indent in her step. “OH JEEZ, I HOPE THEY DON’T TAKE THIS OUT OF MY PAYCHECK… THEN AGAIN THEY PROBABLY WON'T KNOW IT'S ME IF I SHRINK BACK TO NORMAL…”

Bayley VERY slowly bends down to one knee, trying not to put too much pressure on it as she leans down to pick up the remote between the nails of her thumb and forefinger. Since her sudden expansion, the remote’s size causes a bit of concern as she holds it in the palm of her hand. “I GOTTA PLAY THIS CAREFULLY. ONE WRONG MOVE AND I COULD GROW THROUGH THE CEILING… OR MAKE MYSELF SO SMALL I FALL INTO THE FLOORBOARDS. THIS IS WILD!” Since her hands are so big compared to the remote which once fit perfectly in her grasp, Bayley carefully slides her fingerprint over the monitor, until it reaches a number just about half of what she’s currently standing at. Clenching her teeth and pressing the button with the nail of her pinkie finger,, Bayley feels a similar wave of energy enter her body and her height shoots back down to around six feet tall. It's not the same as her old height but at this point she's not going to complain about being six inches taller! "I'm back to normal! Everything's back to normal... well... maybe not everything." She looks down and notices under her feet is the belt she had previously kept on the floor. she picks it up between her thumb and forefinger, realizing it shrunk down along with her. "Well... gonna have to fix that later for sure." Bayley whispers as she takes the child size belt and places it in her bag, knowing full well she'll never get it around her waist. She looks back down at the remote in her hands and says "It's a shame... it was a pretty big rush feeling so huge and i didn't get to enjoy it. Maybe i should try it again and really go for it this time." She looks around the locker room and notices the humongous foot prints and hand prints left in the floor from her last experience and says "... Outside. I should do this outside." She picks up her things and heads for the front door, with an idea in mind on how to feel REALLY big.
13.title: Bigger, Badder Bayley!

choices: Take her dolls somewhere to start playing
Look for more dolls to add to her collection
Look for something more comfortable to keep her dolls in
131.content:
Holding the remote tight, Bayley thinks to herself “I don’t actually have to BE big to FEEL big.. I just need to make someone else feel small... “ She starts messing with the remote, eventually putting it to a setting she believes will make someone the size of a small doll. She holds it up in front of her and says “Okay.. All i need to do is test it… probably on someone who’s not expecting it.” As she says this, she hears an immediate response in a thick Russian accent of “Not expecting WHAT, exactly?” Bayley shrieks in surprise and turns around with the remote pointed right in front of her, blasting the source of noise that startled her. After a brief, familiar flash of light, Bayley’s attention slowly drifts down towards the floor, where she sees a teeny tiny Lana staring up at her. Bayley lifts a hand up and gives the shrunken woman a quick wave, which only gets a high pitched scream in return. “WHOOPS. SORRY, LANA. DIDN’T EXPECT YOU TO BE RIGHT BEHIND ME THERE…”

She crouches down over the panicking little girl at her feet and scoops her up quickly in one hand. Her fingers wrap easily around the doll sized woman and Bayley feels a sudden surge of power as she feels the tiny woman struggling in her grasp. She giggles at the feeling of the little girl’s limbs attempting to move under the vice grip of her fingers, and she says “HEHE… YOU CAN STOP STRUGGLING NOW. YOU’RE NOT GOING ANYWHERE.” Looking around the locker room quickly, Bayley spots a jar filled with athletic tape and bandages, and empties it’s contents out onto the floor. She gently allows Lana to slip out of her grip and into the waiting jar below, where she hits the bottom with a faint “clank” sound. Lana quickly scrambles on her hands and feet to the far side of the glass, away from Bayley’s smiling face closing in, which is distorted by the glass. “THIS IS SO COOL… YOU’RE LIKE THE SIZE OF MY THUMB! I CAN’T WAIT TO GET MORE OF YOU.” She places the jar containing Lana down on a bench, where the miniature Russian bangs her fist against the glass in a feeble attempt to get noticed or escape or… anything, really. Her hopes are dashed immediately, as Bayley brings over the lid of the jar (luckily with a few holes poked into it for air) and she slowly screws it on top, trapping little Lana inside.

With the jar in one hand and the remote in another, Bayley starts to make her way out of the locker room. Lana’s small, but not too small. Only a couple of inches tall. The perfect height to play with. She keeps the settings she used fresh in her mind and makes sure to use that same calibration on all of the people she shrinks. It can get a little confusing if some of her dolls are barbie sized and the others are polly pockets. She likes them just like Lana, able to fit comfortably in one closed hand, and quickly concealable from the outside world. Bayley continues to head backstage, looking for more people to add to her jar, when she comes across a pair of women having a deep conversation. One of the women is Chelsea Green, a newly rising star from NXT. The other is Dana Brooke, who has been on the roster for a long time but never really became a household name. Bayley bites her lip in excitement and says “You know… I’ll bet nobody would notice if the two of them just disappeared for the night…” Without saying a word or even getting their attention, Bayley lifts the remote up and points it directly in the middle of the two talking girls. With amazing accuracy, Bayley seems to hit just the right mark and with one single press of the button on the remote, both Chelsea and Dana find themselves much smaller. They don’t really have a lot of time to react to their new surroundings before Bayley’s massive footsteps close in on them. Bayley places the jar on the ground and uses her newly freed hand to reach out for Dana first, as she attempts to take off running in the opposite direction. Picking her up by the scruff of her shirt, Bayley lets her dangle over the jar for a few seconds before dropping her right on top of Lana. Chelsea on the other hand is too stunned to move and is standing petrified with her hands on her sides. Bayley looks down at her and says very sternly “ARE YOU GOING TO BEHAVE?” Chelsea sees no way out of her current situation and nods up and down frantically. Bayley smiles and says “GOOD.” She places a hand down flat next to her and says “THEN CLIMB ON.” She had only grabbed the shrunken women up until now, but having one willingly step onto her hand was an experience Bayley was not ready for. The shrunken woman carefully lifted herself onto Bayley’s fingers, and then walked down the length of them to get into her palm, before sitting down directly in the center. She barely weighs a thing as Bayley smiles at the feeling of holding another person quite literally in the palm of her hand. Bayley carefully lifts her hand up and tilts it over the edge of the jar, allowing Chelsea a slightly softer landing than her counterpart. Bayley places the lid back on top of the jar and whispers to herself “I CAN ALREADY TELL MISS GREEN IS GOING TO BE MY FAVORITE.”

Holding the jar with her fingertips, Bayley slowly rocks it from side to side, causing all three trapped women to lose their footing and fall on top of each other with each movement. Bayley giggles at their pathetic attempts to stand, and breaths into the glass fogging it up “THREE LITTLE BLONDES TRAPPED IN A JAR. IT’S NOT MUCH OF A COLLECTION YET, BUT IT’S A GOOD START.” All three girls huddle against each other for support and Bayley just laughs at their expressions of fear. “DON’T WORRY, LITTLE DOLLIES. I WON’T HURT YOU. WE’RE JUST GONNA PLAY FOR A BIT. YOU’LL ALL BE BACK TO NORMAL BEFORE YOU KNOW IT.” She looks off to the side for a second and says “I MEAN… MAYBE. I’VE NEVER ACTUALLY TRIED TO UNSHRINK ANYTHING. MAYBE YOU’RE STUCK LIKE THIS FOREVER. EITHER WAY, TONIGHT’S GONNA BE A NIGHT TO REMEMBER!” Bayley closes her eyes and leans her lips into the jar to give her captives inside the glass a quick kiss. The three trapped women are too afraid to move, so Bayley just smacks her lips against the container, and brings the jar back under her arm as she continues her trek backstage. What is her next move?
131.title: Bayley's Doll Collection

choices: The jar is still there... but the dolls are trying to escape!
The jar is still there... but it's tipped over!
The jar is not there... somebody's taken it!
1312.content:
Bayley looks around the corner and is a little confused by what she sees. Asuka and Kairi Sane are standing alone and talking on an empty soundstage, with cameras off and nobody around them. It’s not unusual to see the Kabuki Warriors are standing together, Asuka is holding the Raw Women’s Championship. “Wait, did i miss something? Did she cash in on Becky already?!” Looking at her phone she does a quick google search and says “OH.. Hmm. Well guess I've got a new target then. Don’t wanna get Becky mixed up in this when i can just grab her replacement instead…” She spots a table on the side of the soundstage and places the jar near the edge of the table. She bends over and points at the huddled women inside and says “NOW DON’T MOVE A MUSCLE. I’LL BE BACK WITH A FEW MORE PLAYTHINGS.” She smirks and stands back up to full height, peering around the corner and holding an arm out, staying out of sight so she can aim the remote and zap one of the unsuspecting women.

Asuka looks down at her title and smiles, finally letting it sink in that she’s won the title again and didn’t even have to cash in her money in the bank to do it! Tears of happiness start to well up as she looks back up and sees… nobody. Her friend Kairi was right there, she couldn’t have gone far, but looking around left right and forward, Asuka doesn’t see her going anywhere. But then she hears a faint squeak coming from the ground and looks down at her feet. Standing next to her boots and waving her arms wildly to get her attention is a tiny, doll sized pirate princess. Shocked and startled, Asuka drops the title do the side and gets on her stomach to look down at her tiny friend a little closer to her level. She whispers something in confused Japanese and holds a thumb and forefinger out to emphasize just how small her partner had gotten. “K… KAIRI?! WHAA?” Asuka is so dumbfounded she’s not really paying attention to any of Kairi’s motions, just mesmerized by her stature. Which is why she doesn’t notice Kairi pointing wildly behind Asuka, trying to tell her to turn around. In a flash, Asuka finds herself no longer looking at Kairi, but instead Kairi’s shoes. She gets back to her feet and hugs her friend, happy to see her at a similar size again, but a booming sound behind her drains her of all those happy feelings. She slowly turns around and sees her newly won Women’s championship, in all it’s glory, now the size of a building. Judging by their heights, Asuka and Kairi barely come up to the red underline of the WWE symbol. And that sight is replaced by a huge hand reaching down and grabbing the title, lifting it off the ground. Asuka and Kairi grab each other as they find themselves in the shadow of a woman who normally stands 5 and a half feet… but now towers over them looking more than 100 feet tall. Bayley doesn’t even acknowledge the tiny women cowering in her presence, , instead looking at the title belt she’s just confiscated off the floor. Holding it in one hand she says “YOU KNOW IT’S KIND OF A PAIN HOLDING TWO OF THESE AT A TIME… WHY DON’T WE MAKE THIS MORE MANAGEABLE…” She holds the belt out and with her other hand, shrinks it down to a much smaller size. Now holding it like a class ring (which admittedly it looked very much like anyway, Bayley simply wraps it around her ring finger and clasps it shut. She says as she holds her hand out in front of her face to admire her new jewelry “MUCH BETTER. IT’S SO MUCH EASIER TO CARRY THESE THINGS AROUND WHEN THEY’RE SMALL.” She crosses her arms and looks down to finally address the two shrunken joshis and says “SPEAKING OF SMALL… YOU GUYS SURE ARE A LOT CUTER AT THAT SIZE... BUT IT'S PRETTY DANGEROUS DOWN THERE ON THE FLOOR WHERE YOU CAN GET SQUISHED... WHY DON'T YOU LET ME TAKE CARE OF YOU FOR A WHILE?” Asuka and Kairi scream and point at Bayley, immediately taking off running in the opposite direction. Bayley merely takes one slow step behind them, allowing them a few yards of distance to give them a sense of false hope. With her second step, she slams her boot down right next to Kairi’s minuscule body, causing her to fly to the left and knock over her partner in a tumbling mess. Bayley crouches down to see her new toys in a different light and says “COME ON NOW, I’M WAY TOO BIG FOR YOU TO GET AWAY. BUT I HAVE TO ADMIT, IT’S ALWAYS FUN WATCHING YOU SHRINKY DINKS TRY AND FLEE.” Bayley expects a similar attitude from Kairi and Asuka that she got from her previous victims, but instead, Kairi and Asuka simply pick themselves up, brush themselves off, and start pointing up at her, squeaking out a few choice words in Japanese, before going over to her boot and giving the toe section a swift kick, showing they were not afraid.

Bayley is stunned, and honestly loves how feisty they are acting. They’re in no condition to beat her in any fight, but still they feel the need to act so tough. It was actually really endearing. “ARE.. ARE YOU THREATENING ME? AT THAT HEIGHT? YOU TWO ARE SO ADORABLE, COME HERE MY LITTLE WARRIORS!!” Bayley bends down and swiftly picks up each of the newly shrunken Kabuki warriors, wrapping her fingers around one in each of her hands. She rises back up to her full height and brings her fists right next to each other at eye level so she can see both of her new captives up close and personal. Asuka continues her high-pitched ranting while Kairi silently shakes her head in anger as Bayley’s giant lips open to reveal a grin large enough to swallow them whole. “HEHE… I SHOULD REALLY BE GOING AFTER MORE TAG TEAMS. YOU GUYS ARE WAY MORE FUN TO CAPTURE TWO AT A TIME.” Bayley continues to laugh, loving the power she feels as she occasionally tightens and loosens her grip Asuka and Kairi who are struggling against their fleshy prisons. Asuka had been yelling at her nonstop since the realization she was only a few inches tall, and while being held in the air she seems to run out of energy and just breathes heavily. Bayley tilts her head and condescendingly pouts her lips “AWWW, TUCKERED OUT ALREADY? HOPE NOT, I’VE GOT A LOT OF IDEAS ON WHAT TO DO WITH SOMEONE LIKE YOU, ASUKA.” The shrunken facepainted woman pounds both of her hands against the thumb held tight over her chest, angry that she is powerless to stop someone she knows she could beat in a fair fight. Bayley walks off the soundstage with her prizes in hand and whispers “ALRIGHT THEN… LET’S GO SHOW YOU TO THE REST OF THE TOYS.” When Bayley makes it to the other side of the studio where she had placed the jar, she looks at the table and sees...
1312.title: Two Tiny Kabuki Dolls

choices: Some bigger ladies (Nia Jax and Tamina)
The title holders (Alexa Bliss and Nikki Cross)
An Iiconic pair (Billie Kay and Peyton Royce)
13121.content:
Bayley casually makes her way back to the table where the rest of her little dolls are waiting for her, enjoying the feeling as Asuka and Kairi try in vain to pry her powerful fingers off of their tiny waists. She goes up to the jar, and sees that the shrunken women are clearly still inside and moving around, however the lid she had screwed on the top seems to have flown off and landed on the floor. “Hmm. That’s weird. Guess it came off somehow…” Bayley kneels down and knows she needs to free a hand up, so she transfers Kairi into her opposite hand, leaving both of the Kabuki Warriors pressed up against each other in their captor’s single fist. However while she’s at a lower level, Bayley looks inside the jar and her eyes go a little wide at what she sees. Chelsea and Dana are kneeling on the floor of the jar, and on top of their shoulders, standing high is Lana. Lana’s got her arms reaching up towards the lip of the jar, obviously looking to grab onto it and lift herself out. The dolls are attempting a brave escape! Bayley stifles a giggle. They look absolutely adorable in there. But at the same time they need to be taught a lesson. Trying not to break the girl’s attention, Bayley slowly lifts her hand towards the top of the jar, and waits for Lana to stop steadying herself.

The second Lana looks up, she gasps in shock as Bayley’s fist is hovering over the opening of the jar, holding on to two more shrunken wrestlers. Bayley bites her lip and releases her grip, dropping both Kairi and Asuka from the imposing height and directly into the container, causing the newly formed human pyramid to crumble to the ground. The shrunken women slowly bring themselves back up to their feet, now with the knowledge that their temporary home just became a little bit more crowded. All five women look outside the jar and see Bayley with her chin resting on her hands, looking at her pets with a look of playful disappointment. She traces the outside of the jar with her fingertip and says through the glass ‘I HAVE TO SAY, I’M VERY DISAPPOINTED IN THE THREE OF YOU. I TOLD YOU NOT TO TRY ANYTHING STUPID, BUT YOU COULDN’T EVEN HANDLE A SIMPLE INSTRUCTION. SO SINCE YOU ARE TEMPTED TO CLIMB OUT SO MUCH, I’LL HAVE TO MAKE IT A BIT HARDER FOR YOU TO REACH THE TOP." She moves her face away and the shrunken girls all scream as Bayley reaches into the jar, holding the remote. The blondes and the japanese duo are scared stifff as they all witness a familiar flash followed by a powerful surge of energy going through their bodies. Within just a few seconds, the women find themselves in a glass prison almost five times as large, with a lot more space in between each of them. Looking out through the clear walls they see Bayley smiling in on them, her already massive face now an imposing billboard. Bayley lets out a small chuckle at their predicament, and the insect sized women feel her low laughter shake the ground beneath them. “HEHE, THERE WE GO. NOW THE ONLY WAY YOU”RE GETTING OUT OF THAT JAR IS IF I PLUCK YOU OUT MYSELF. YOU’RE TOO TEENY TO REACH THE TOP, AND EVEN THOUGH YOU’RE ALL AS SMALL AS ANTS, I DOUBT YOU CAN CLIMB LIKE THEM.” Bayley is a little upset that she can’t see the looks on her shrunken toy’s faces now that they’re so small. But that feeling is replaced by an overwhelming surge of power knowing that they’re tiny enough to be smooshed under a fingertip. If she wanted to, she could line up each of them side by side and they could probably fit between her toes. Bayley knows it’s gonna be harder for her to play with them at this size, but they need to learn to respect their master. Besides, she could always just enlarge them one by one as she wanted to play with each of them in real time.

Meanwhile within the jar itself, a skirmish has broken out as the girls turn on each other. Asuka shoves Dana Brooke down on the ground and stands over her, screaming something in Japanese. Kairi grabs Lana by the dress and threatens to punch her square in the face. The Kabuki Warriors are clearly upset having been made even smaller all because of the stupid actions of the other three. Bayley furrows her brow and flicks the jar hard, causing a resounding “PING” sound to echo through the inside and drop all the girls to their knees. She places a palm on either side of the jar and effortlessly lifts it off the table, holding it up to her face level as she peers in on her captives. “HEY... NO FIGHTING IN THERE. I DON’T WANT MY TOYS BRUISING THEMSELVES UP BEFORE I GET TO PLAY WITH THEM. ASUKA, KAIRI, I KNOW YOU’RE UPSET BUT THAT’S NO EXCUSE FOR BAD BEHAVIOR. NOW BEHAVE OR I’LL HAVE TO SEPARATE YOU FROM THE REST OF MY TOYS AND YOUR NEW HOME WILL BE MUCH LESS PLEASANT THAN THIS.” Kairi and Asuka don’t know what she means by that, but they’re afraid to think about it. As opposed to before when Bayley was merely a giant, she is now an imposing goddess and even the Warriors find themselves shaking at the thought of getting on her bad side. Bayley can’t keep up her mean mugging for very long as she breaks into a smile and tilts her head before her even smaller prey. “AWW, I CAN’T STAY MAD AT YOU ALL FOR TOO LONG. YOU’RE EVEN CUTER WHEN YOU’RE ALL SUPER TINY! AND NOW THAT I THINK ABOUT IT… WITH YOU GUYS SO ITTY BITTY, I HAVE LOTS OF ROOM FOR MORE TOYS! SO LET’S GO GRAB A FEW MORE, SHALL WE?” The shrunken women brace themselves as Bayley drops the jar to her waist and begins walking away. Her footsteps and movements are more profound now that they’re so insignificant, and even the slightest movement of her hands causes them to lose their footing and crash into each other. This was going to be a very long night as Bayley hunts down her next targets...
13121.title: Tiny Actions Have Big Consequences

13123.content:
Bayley starts to get a little concerned as she gets closer to the table and doesn't see her jar waiting for her. She stands right up at the table and sees some loose papers, a small pencil... but no collection of shrunken women. She starts to panic a bit and her palms become sweaty, grossing out Asuka and Kairi as they feel her perspiration seep into their clothing. Bayley gently places Asuka and Kairi's little bodies down on the surface of the table and points her finger down onto the wood directly in front of her. "DON'T YOU TWO MOVE. NOT A MUSCLE. I'M GONNA GET TO THE BOTTOM OF THIS." The two little women stand perfectly still as Bayley scans the entire area looking for any evidence of what happened to her blonde barbies. "Maybe the jar rolled away off the table... Maybe they found a way to escape... Damn it, this isn't good, i shouldn't have been so careless with them!" She gets down low onto her stomach, looking for more clues, and right underneath the table where she started, she spots a small pink envelope with her name on it. "Oh great. That's not creepy or anything." Bayley places one hand on the tabletop to steady herself and readjusts her body so she can easily reach under the table and grab her present. As soon as she reaches out for it though, a sharp pain strikes her square in the tip of her pinkie finger. "OUCH! WHAT THE HELL?" Bayley shakes her hand out and places it back on the table, as she pulls her body up forward to see what caused the sting in the first place. To her surprise, the Kabuki Warriors have moved from their spot on the table, and have commandeered the pencil left next to the loose papers! Kairi is at the front, pointing the sharpened graphite tip right at Bayley's massive hand, intent on pushing it in again. "We not toys, Bayley! You make us big now!" Asuka hoists her rubber eraser covered end of the pencil up high, ready to plunge it back into her delicate skin. "Unshrink Asuka! Unshrink Kairi! Or we get you good!"

Bayley doesn't even change her expression, she just holds the remote up to Kairi and Asuka and says "I DON'T HAVE TIME FOR THIS." With a quick zap of the button, the two doll sized women are no longer able to hold the weight of the pencil and find themselves trapped beneath it. Using just the finger tip of her index finger, Bayley slowly rolls the pencil to one side, freeing the double-shrunk Asian girls stuck underneath. As the two climb to their feet, they are immediately pressed down into the table by that same fingertip, only now it seems to be covered in a thin layer of sticky liquid, which covers both Asuka and Kairi and lifts them off the table with it. Bayley has obviously licked her fingertip and trapped both of the Kabuki Warriors, now only a quarter inch tall, on the surface of her extended digit. Kairi and Asuka scream in horror as an eye several times their size focuses in on the two of them. "FIRST I LOSE MY OTHER DOLLS, THEN YOU TWO ACTUALLY TRY TO THREATEN ME WITH A FREAKING PENCIL? ANY OTHER TIME I WOULD HAVE FOUND THAT KIND OF CUTE, BUT NOW IS NOT THE TIME FOR FOOLING AROUND... SO UNTIL I GET WHAT I WANT, YOU TWO ARE IN TIME OUT!" While she's talking, Bayley shifts her foot from side to side, loosening her boot until she is able to slip her foot out of it. To the Kabuki Warrior's absolute dread, they see that Bayley has clearly been wearing the boots all day, and hasn't been wearing socks inside them. Bayley's finger travels down the length of her body, finally reaching it's destination at her smelly, sweaty foot. With one powerful swipe, Asuka and Kairi find themselves forced off of the fingertip, and directly in the space between Bayley's big and second toe. The smell of her feet is unbearable and the sweat, much like her saliva, sticks to Asuka and Kairi's skin and will not allow them to move much. Bayley blows the two insects a kiss before clenching her toes together slightly, unable to feel their insignificant weight even in one of her most sensitive areas. "I'LL DEAL WITH YOU SPECKS LATER. TRY NOT TO GET CRUSHED DOWN THERE AND MAYBE I'LL GIVE YOU SOME FRESH AIR AT THE END OF THE NIGHT." Asuka and Kairi can say and do nothing as they are pressed on all sides by walls of sweaty flesh and carried into the darkness of Bayley's waiting boot. Her attention no longer needed to take care of the fleas under her feet, Bayley returns her attention to the envelope, and opens it up revealing a small note:

"I know what you've been up to, and i have something you want. Come see me in the private suite and bring the remote. Come alone. No funny business."

The note ends there, but Bayley turns it around and sees two initials, telling her just who took her shrunken playthings, and who she's going to have to confront... It's signed:
13123.title: Bayley's Dolls Were Taken!

choices: Sasha Banks (And she's looking to play around with Bayley!)
Shayna Baszler (And she wants to take the remote from Bayley!)
Shotzi Blackheart (And she wants to stop Bayley from shrinking everyone!)
131231.content: With a head full of steam, Bayley marches her way through the backstage area, outside of the barricade and into the crowd. She ignores all of the cheering and adoring fans, her eyes filled with rage and determination as she pushes through and makes her way into the stadium's private suites. "After i get my toys back, i'm gonna have to be extra careful with them. It'll all be fine once i find out who took them and give them a piece of my mind..." When she gets to a door marked with a familiar "S.B.", she knows she's in the right place and kicks in the door looking for answers. The room is a fully furnished suite with a couch, massive television, a well stocked fridge, and a large ornate table with chairs and stools all around it. It's like a little apartment for people to watch the matches in! Directly in front of the couch is a small glass table, and directly in the center is the familiar jar, with Dana Brooke, Chelsea Green, and Lana still trapped inside. And after the relief washes over her knowing her toys were safe, she looks to the couch and sees a familiar face. It's the "S.B." from the note! It's...
131231.title: The Note was marked "S.B."

choices: Sasha is right - time to put the woman in their private areas
Sasha is wrong - that's too perverted
1312311.content:
"Hi Bayley!" Sasha greeted her friend warmly, a grin on her face.

"Sasha...what are you doing with those?" Bayley gestured over to the jar of the shrunken women, all of them having now gotten up and pounding against the glass.

"Stop it!" Sasha commanded, picking up the jar to her face. She gave it a slap and then shook it around for good measure, sending the women inside flying around. She giggled before putting the jar back down, confident that they wouldn't be disturbed again.

She focused her attention back to Bayley. "I saw what you were doing. And I wanted to join you and have some fun with them."

"You do?" Bayley asked. Though she knew her best friend very well, she hadn't even thought of getting her involved. Now it seemed like a good idea.

"Yeah! I mean, they're the perfect size to play with."

Bayley smiled, eyes shining with enthusiasm. "Oh Sasha, we're going to have so much fun with them."

"Definitely!" Sasha grinned. "I mean, who needs a vibrator when you can stick a tiny woman in there?"

"Woah, what?" Bayley was stunned. That hadn't been anywhere near what she was planning on doing with them.

"Well, what were you going to do with them?" Sasha arched an eyebrow.

"I was just going to mess with them a bit, play some games, pretend they were actual dolls."

Sasha shook her head. Even after all this time, her best friend was still somewhat naive. She just had to persuade her. She always did.

"Bayley, is that really what you want? I mean come on, you're a grown woman. A woman with needs. Don't you want to satisfy those needs? I mean, it's not like they were doing much anyway. This will be the closest they get to success."

Sasha continued to gaze into Bayley's eyes, pouting to try to convince Bayley to give in to her.

What does Bayley decide to do?
1312311.title: Sasha Banks Wants to Play

choices: Sasha sticks Bayley in her pants
Sasha forces Bayley to watch as she sticks the other women in her clothing
13123113.content:
"While you're deciding, can I take a look at that size remote, bestie?" Sasha asked, with Bayley too lost in thought to notice the subtle undertones of Sasha's voice.

"Sure Sash, here you go," Bayley said before handing it over.

"Oh thanks, you big idiot." Sasha's voice instantly took on a more cold demeanour.

Bayley looked at her best friend in confusion. Without warning, Sasha pressed a button while pointing the remote at Bayley, shrinking her friend down to a couple of inches tall. Sasha then bent downwards, picking the shrunken Bayley up. "Make that small idiot."

"No! Sasha, why?" Bayley yelled in horror, completely in disbelief that her best friend had shrunken her down. And considering what Sasha wanted to do with the other tiny women...

Bayley then began to pound against Sasha's closed fist. The giantess only boomed with laughter at the sensation, feeling little more than a tickle against her skin.

Unbeknownst to Sasha, Bayley had already had the tiny Kabuki Warriors in her boots before shrinking down. Now, they were invisible specks to Sasha's eyes.

Sasha then walked over to the couch and sat down, before uncurling her fingers to reveal a terrified Bayley.

"You took too long to decide, so I made your choice for you. You weren't with me, well now you'll do whatever I want to do with you." The Boss grinned down at her friend, greatly unsettling the tiny Bayley.

What happens next?
13123113.title: Sasha Shrinks Bayley

choices: Test out the ray a little bit more
Sasha walks out someone else comes into the locker room
131231131.content:
The boss brings Bayley up to her face

1542.content:
Backslash 2020 had just ended. Many fans and wrestlers alike wondering if they had seen the “greatest Wreslting match ever”. But With so many happy people there were bound to be those who weren’t.

Inside the women’s locker room, the two resident Aussies Billie Kay and Peyton Royce, collectively known as the IIconics were having a frustrating night.

Thy had just competed in a triple threat tag team match for the Women’s tag titles. But despite an impressive showing the two had fallen short when Sasha Banks pinned Alexa Bliss to retain the tag titles for her and Bayley. Suffice to say the IIconics were not happy.

Angrily kicking the door open Billie and Peyton stormed in and started letting out their frustrations.

“This isn’t fair! We shouldn’t lose cause that incompetent bitch Alexa Bliss got pinned!” Billie yelled.

“Yeah we were kicking ass out there! We were number one contenders it should never have been a triple threat match!” Peyton chimed in.

The two then started to trash the women’s locker room. Picking up the trash cans and dumping it’s content all over the floor. Kicking over chairs, ripping other women’s clothes apart. They were doing a great job of “Tommy Wiseau-Ing” up the place.

As they trashed the room however, Peyton picked up a box which was in face a delivery for one of the other female superstars. Not caring one bit about some one else property she threw it against the wall.

Upon hitting the wall something strange happened. A beam shot out of the box and hit one of the upturned chairs. To the IIconics astonishment the chair shrank! It got smaller and smaller until it resembled a doll house piece!

“What the Fuck!” Billie exclaimed.

“That did not just happen!” Peyton added.

They IIconics cautiously approached the box and Peyton poked at it with her foot. The box tipped over and out fell what looked like a toy gun.

Curiously Billie reached down and picked it up the gun. Examining it she saw two settings in the gun, an “S” and a “G”.

“What the hell is this?” Billie asked as she turned the gun over in her hands.

Meanwhile Peyton saw there was a note with the gun and walked over to read it.

“Hey look there’s a note. Maybe it’ll answer some questions.” Peyton said optimistically.

However before she could pick it up Billie accidentally pulled the trigger. A beam shot out and hit the note just before Peyton could reach it.

Billie being a little trigger happy didn’t let go until the gun shrank the paper so small it couldn’t be seen by the human eye.

“Whoops! My bad!” Billie said.

“It’s fine you didn’t hit me. Ah well I doubt that note was important. “ Peyton said walking over to Billie.

“This is so cool! Wait If the S shrinks then the G must...” Billie started saying.

She switched the gun from S to G and fired at a discarded coffee cup on the ground. Within seconds it grew until it was as tall as the ceiling!

The IIconics then marveled over the shrink rays possibilities in the most cliche of ways until they started talking about revenge either shrinking the women’s division or growing themselves.

What happened next?
1542.title: The IIconics Take Charge

15421.content:
As much fun as it would be growing to insane heights and terrorizing the arena and city, the two Aussies didn’t want to draw ant attention to themselves...yet.

So the two settle in shrinking every woman in the division. And they knew exactly who they were going to shrink first!

“Ooooh Billie lets go shrink that bitch Alexa! Peyton suggested.

“Oh my god Pey That’s such a good idea! We can make her pay for costing us the tag titles!” Billie replied enthusiastically.

“Damn right! And you knew want it’ll be?” Peyton asked.

The two then took their usual pose and in a loud obnoxious voice shouted.

IICONIC!!!”

Almost as if it was it fate, the Locker room door opened and in walked Alexa Bliss! The goddess of wwe was rubbing her neck in exhaustion, she wasn’t alone however as she was flanked by her tag team partner Nikki Cross!

“Man I’m sorry I cost us the match tonight nikki.” Alexa said sadly.

“It’s fine Lexi! We lost tonight but we’ll just get the next time!” Nikki said positively.

The two shared a walking bug as they finally realized they weren’t alone in the room. Stank eyeing the IIconics they walked past them and opened up her locker.

“Well look who it is Peyton. The loser squad is here!” Billie taunted.

“Oh good one Billie!” Peyton said high fiving her partner.

Alexa and Nikki just ignored them as they were above the IIconics petty insults. However the Aussies weren’t gonna let up so easily.

“Oh Billie I don’t think they heard you.” Peyton said, sarcastically putting her hand on her cheek.

“It mustn’t be because we’re up here and they’re all the way down there, they’re quite small aren’t they?” Billie said winking at Peyton.

That was the last straw for Alexa. She could handle just about any insult but she couldn’t handle someone insulting her height! Turning around she got right up in Billie Kay’s face...or chest and started giving out to her.

“Listen here you Aussie bitch! If you’re having trouble hearing me then maybe I should hit you right on those big ears if yours and make you hear me!” Alexa shouted at her.

This was just what they wanted, as Alexa squared up to Billie, Peyton smoked the shrink ray at her and fired. Within seconds she shrank down until she was only 2 inches tall!

Alexa had no idea what just happened. She was looking for Billie Kay when all of a sudden a gigantic boot stomped down in front of her! Craning her neck she let out a small scream as she looked up and saw the terrifying sight of Billie smirking down at her! She was huge!

“What the Fuck just happened! Why are you so big!” Alexa screamed.

Billie and Peyton laughed down at the tiny woman at their feet. Nikki saw this and let out s small shriek as she got down onto her knees in front of Alexa.

The goddess was almost crushed by her friends titanic figure hitting the ground! She was amazed at how ever her small tag team partner was huge compared to her now!

“Alexa are ya ok!” Nikki asked in her thick Scottish accent.

She lowered her face so she was level with Alexa’s tiny two inch frame. As she did this Peyton aimed the gun at Nikki and fired. Just like her best friend she shrank until she was only two inches tall!

Nikki was confused, as one moment she was looking at a tiny Alexa and the next she was looking at her boots!

“Alexa you’re back to Normal!” Nikki exclaimed happily.

Alexa looked scared however as she raised a trembling hand and pointed above her. Nikki turned around and gulped as she saw the giantess IIconic duo smiling down at them menacingly.

“Haha well, well, well! Look who came up short again” Billie taunted.

Her and Peyton let out small shrieks of joy as they stomped their feet. The tiny women at their feet running in terror as the gigantic boots were causing life ending tremors.

“Oh look Billie they’re trying to escape!” Peyton said pointing.

“Not on my watch!” Billie retorted.

In one fell swoop she reached down and scooped up the tiny pair in her giant hand. The tiny tag team tried to pound away at her flesh but it was no use.

Now with the tiny Pair in their grip Billie and Peyton had to decide what to do with them. They settled on hiding the pair in one of their purses. Alexa and Nikki were deposited into Peyton’s purse as Billie carried the shrink ray.

They had collected their first of many women. They couldn’t wait to shrink everyone down to different sizes and kidnap for their amusement.

Next on their list was...
15421.title: Shrinking the competition

154213.content:
The IIconics had taken their first steps on their way to shrinking the entire women’s division. They had Alexa Bliss and Nikki Cross Shrunken to 2 inches tall and hidden away in Peyton’s purse. Billie Kay firmly grasped the shrink ray in her hands as the two Aussies decided who they would shrink next.

“Oh my god Pey this is so much fun! I can’t believe we have Alexa and Nikki in your purse!” Billie said excitedly.

“I know Billie! I can’t wait to add a few more tiny bitches to our collection!” Peyton responded positively.

The IIconics then put their thinking caps on as they placed a finger to their chins as if they were tasing this incredibly seriously. After a few seconds Billie let out an over exaggerated gasp as she grabbed Peyton’s arm enthusiastically.

“Oooooooh Pey! Pey! Pey! I know who we should shrink!”

“Oooooh who Billie! Who!”

Billie then cupped her hand around Peyton’s ear as she whispered her idea into her besties ear. Peyton’s face lit up with excitement at this as she and Billie jumped up and down like a pair of excited school girls.

“That’s a great idea Billie! Let’s do it!” Peyton said.

The two then prepared to leave but not before taking a peak into the purse to see their little prisoners. Opening it they see Nikki in her knees with Alexa stood on top trying to reach the opening.

“Hihi Oh my god look they’re actually trying to climb out!” Peyton teased!

“Escape? You gotta be jokin me!” Billie said comedically yet seriously.

Billie then lowered her massive hand and using her giant fingers flicked Alexa off of Nikki and flying until she bounced off of a tube of mascara.

“Alexa!” Nikki yelled panicking tunningniver to her dazed friend.

She didn’t get far as Peyton reached in and plucked Nikki between two gargantuan fingers. She was held up in front of the IIconics giant faces who looked at the struggling Scot with unhappy expressions.

“Now listen here shrimp, if you or the little Polly pocket try to escape again then we’re either gonna separate ya or shrink ya’s smaller!” Billie threatened.

Nikki gulped and nodded as Peyton dumped her in the purse again, she crawled pathetically over to tend to Alexa as the purse was zipped closed again.

The IIconics then exited their locker room and headed down the corridor. It didn’t take too long until the pair stumbled across just who they were looking for.

Stretching in the floor in front of them were the resident dancers of wwe. Carmella and Naomi, the pair were getting ready for their tag title opportunity against Bayley and Sasha. Something the IIconics were pissed about as they should have a title opportunity.

Walking up they stand with their hands in their hips standing over the dancers.

“Yo! You bitches mind? Unlike you we’ve actually got a match to prepare for tonight!” Naomi snapped at the two.

“Yeah, don’t you know that Naomi and Mella are money? We’re a big deal!” Carmella chimed in.

At that line, Billie and Peyton lit up excitedly. Clapping their hands together they had to calm each other time before they spoke.

“Ooooh I love it when they set us up!” Billie said grinning.

“I know Billie! Now why don’t you show them who the big deal is?” Peyton said struggling to hold laugher in.

Billie nodded her approval and took out her shrink ray. She pointed it at the surprised duo on the floor and fired at them.

How small did she shrink them?

Stephanie decides to first be young again!
15431.content:
Stephanie McMahon walked in the locker room with a sigh.

She was tired. Years and years of hard work, trying to make a difference and... she couldn't say things were going the way she wanted. It was like despite her best efforts, she simply couldn't win the fight against destiny. Maybe the bad guys always lose in the end...

And this was precisely what she was thinking when she walked in the locker room.

"What's this?" she said as she noticed the weird box in the middle of the locker room. A letter on it read :

"To who ever finds this device used it to make a BIG Impact or if you so choose a Small Impact"

"What kind of joke is that?" she shook her head "Not even a funny one with that..."

She opened the box out of curiosity, and inside found what looked like an old smartphone. Or maybe a small tablet. She couldn't really tell. The moment she grabbed it, the screen turned on, and Stephanie saw a perfect replica of herself, standing, arms spread, like some kind of videogame character.

"Subject scan... complete - Stephanie McMahon"

"What the hell?" she blinked.

But as she checked the screen, she saw numbers popping. Height, weight, strength... and actually, every data she was thinking about seemed to be popping on screen, with next to it a dial, numbers, arrows... out of curiosity, she toyed with the "hair length" dial. And chuckled as on the screen, her hair grew longer and longer... so long that it was soon rubbing against her ass.

"It looks so realistic..." she said before she felt something brushing against her ass. She gasped, turned, and as she did, hair wayyyy longer than she was supposed to have flew in the air. She immediately turned back the dial to its normal position, and her hair returned to normal.

"This is real!" she exclaimed "Real!"

And more data popped on screen as she thought about them : "Size" "Strength" "Age", "Bra size"...

She grinned.

Today, maybe the bad guys could win...
15431.title: Stephanie McMahon

choices: Attack of the 50 feet tall Stephanie!
154311.content:
Stephanie grinned. As she read the height number : 5'8.

Today, not only the bad guys could win... but not just in WWE. She could become the queen of the bad guys. Actually, she could become the biggest, baddest girl ever. They thought WWE was just a show? She was going to become the most powerful woman ever... for real. And her ambitions weren't fake. They were real. And BIG.

"Look at me guys... because today, the world is about to change!"

She toyed with the height dial. 5'8 became 6'0.

In answer, she felt a strange tingling in her body, and as she looked up from the screen, her perspective was changing. She was looking at the locker room from higher. And higher. It worked! Meaning...

"Bigger." she smirked as she turned the dial further.

6'0 became 6'6.

She noticed not only the growth was happening faster, but her clothes were growing along. She was simply expanding in all directions. As she looked at the floor moving further, she smiled. Just like at the end of an elevator ride, she felt the growth stopping. She was a clean 6'6. Not even speaking of the heels she had. Meaning right now, she was one of the biggest, strongest women the WWE ever saw. She smiled.

"Not just one." she whispered to herself "Bigger!" she repeated.

She turned the dial from 6'6 to 7'6. A whole foot taller!

This time, she could almost feel something shaking deep inside her, like her insides expanding with her. The whole room looked like it was shrinking around her. God, this feeling was amazing! She was getting so big! She stared as she suddenly grew higher than the doorframe. She reached 7'6... and knew she was an amazon now. No girl could beat her now. And men would need to team up to hope to have a chance!

Should she stop here?

Of course not.

"I'm a bad girl..." she whispered, amused.

And pushed the dial all the way to 9'6.

"Yes!" she exclaimed as she started expanding again. This time, she could almost hear herself growing! She looked up with a smile as now, she was getting closer to the ceiling! Every single second, this thing which used to be so high above her was getting closer! And as she looked up, her nose was so close to it when the growth stopped.

She was too big for the door now. She'd need to bow to get in or out any room. And fighting... now even a whole team of strong men couldn't compete with him.

"But I want more than a show... all hail your new queen!"

She turned the dial. More. And more. Until even her couldn't believe the number she was reading.

"It's going to be a BIG one!" she laughed...

* * *


Becky Lynch was on her way to the locker room with a grin. A member of the security staff just told her Stephanie got in the locker room. Becky grinned as she knocked at the door.

"You locked yourself in there? Afraid? Because I've been working hard and pumping iron, and girl, I wanted to tell you, now, you and your friends don't stand a ch..."

She heard a rumble. A loud one. Growing inside the locker room. The knob started shaking. The door too. The walls too?!

"What's happeni..."

The door and wall in front of her burst. Two enormous breasts pushed out of them, and gigantic arms and legs moved on each side of her. But before she could move, she was engulfed by the expanding, dark cleavage, while more and more walls burst in every direction, people fleeing the expanding Stephanie outgrowing everything she touched...

But just how big was she going to be?

It takes them little time before they get to the Hudson River. They smile as they cast long shadows into the city with their hands on their hips. They look at each other and nod with a smile before they look back at the city.
"Fe!' Stephanie shouts
"Fi!" Charlotte shouts.
"Fo!' Bayley shouts.
"Fum!' Alexa shouts.
"We smell the blood of little New Yorkers!" they shout in unison as they step into, and walk across, the Hudson. As they do, Stephanie can't help but raise her hand and slam it on the George Washington Bridge, sending part of it into the river below.
As soon as they get to the other bank, all manner of panic starts to ensue. This only seems to please the queens more as it gives them easier targets. They see that they are running in all directions, leading the queens to wonder what would be better.

Lacey knows that the odds are against her. She's facing four women that are 2000 feet tall and has no backup at all. Regardless, she knows that she has to at least attempt something.
It is with this thought that she charges at Stephanie's shoe. She tries grappling with it, pulling at it with every fiber of her being. She writhes around on and against the shoe, trying to take it down.
The four queens look down at her pathetic attempts at fighting them and laugh manically. They have trouble believing that anyone would even try to make a fight of these odds.
"Hey, Lacey," Stephanie taunts, "how's the fight going down there? You're supposed to be fighting us, not our shoes."
"You look so cute like that," Charlotte says.
"So pathetic," Bayley says.
"I bet you wish you could be one of us now," Alexa taunts.
Undaunted, Lacey keeps fighting the shoe. She thinks she moves it, but it's just Stephanie shifting her weight.
"Do you give up?" Stephanie taunts. "That would be the smart thing to do."

From this point, it doesn't take much longer for the three queens to get to the greater Dallas area. They march through the suburbs without a care about anything that happens to get caught under their feet. Once they get to the outskirts of Dallas proper, they look upon the city with their hands on their hips and smiles on their lips.
"FE!" Stephanie shouts.
"FI!" Charlotte shouts.
"FO!" Bayley shouts.
"FUM!" all three shout in unison. "We'll crush you, and have so much fun!"
No sooner do those words escape their lips do they lift their feet and stomp hard. This naturally sends the crowds running, which only serves to bring the queens into the city.
"Look at you pathetic bugs run," Stephanie taunts. "It's as though none of you are bright enough to bow down to your goddesses. Well, for that, all of you must pay the consequences."
With that, all of them keep marching on Dallas. All of them kick buildings at once, sending them flying far. They take care to stomp on the biggest crowds, grinding a few into the pavement.

It was while Charlotte was looking at her boot grinding a crowd that she gets an idea. She unwittingly sits on a crowd behind her and pulls it off, seeing if Becky is still alive. When she sees that she is, she pulls her out and sets her on the ground.
"I never thought that you would last this long," Charlotte admits. "If the others are in favor of it, I think you deserve a reward for it."
She then looks at Stephanie and Bayley, who both agree. Stephanie pulls out the gun and shoots Becky without hesitation. All of them watch as Becky inches up. Becky looks at them as she quickly grows to their height.
Becky looks around at the city before looking at the other queens before them.
"I think I can have some fun with this," Becky says aloud. What does she mean?

Becky looks at the queens, shaking her head before turning back to the city in front of her, knowing right away what she wants to do and knowing how to do it.
"FE!" Becky shouts before lifting her boot and slamming it on a crowd. "FI!" Another stomp. "FO!" Another stomp. "FUM!" Yet another stomp. "I'm going to have so much fun!" With that, she starts stomping her own way through Dallas.
For their part, the other three look on, impressed with what they were seeing.
"I think we really underestimated her," Charlotte says quietly to Stephanie.
"I didn't know the girl had it in her," Bayley says.
"I don't know what you two think," Stephanie says absently, "but I think Dallas has found its new queen."
"I agree," Charlotte says.
"No argument here," Bayley says.
"Then it's settled," Stephanie says. "Maybe we can leave her to her own devices."
"Ok," the other two say in unison.
"I say that we should move on", Stephanie says.
"Ok," they say again.

1543112.content:
Becky Lynch gasped as she was back to the real world after having plunged into a warm chasm of darkness.

"Who was trapped in there?" said a booming voice.

Becky looked up in awe to see the massive face of Stephanie growing above her, smiling down at her puny form. While under her, the ground was shaking... oh no! She was standing in the middle of the palm of Stephanie's hand, and she was still growing!

"How?! Stop this! This is madness!" Becky begged.
"Stop? Mmmm... what about not?" laughed Stephanie, still expanding, dust on her shirt "But since I heard you bragging earlier... let's do this: wrestle my thumb. If you can beat a single of my fingers, I'll stop growing."

Becky didn't have a choice. Whatever was happening here, the sake of the world was in her hands. She looked at the fingers growing around her like a cage. Stephanie's thumb was smaller than her right now, at 5'0. She ran to it, and tried to bring it down. She used all her strength, and at first, the thumb started going down.

"Yes..." she gasped between efforts.

But she could feel it growing between her arms. Getting bigger. Stronger. Stephanie, smiling, looked at the girl getting smaller and smaller compared to her fingers. Within seconds, Becky had to fight a thumb as big as she was... then bigger. Then MUCH bigger. Until she was fighting a pillar of flesh she couldn't even move. She fell on her ass, panting.

"One of my fingers is stronger than you are... how disappointing!" laughed Stephanie "Now, join your little friends down there, you're not even worth touching me!"

She dropped her to the ground, where she'd have a perfect sight of the expanding giantess.

"Time to have a stroll!" the louder and louder voice of the giantess said.

* * *


Meanwhile, downtown, it was a perfectly normal day. People were walking in the streets, doing some shopping or just working in offices

When people froze.

Lights were flickering downtown. Both in the streets and in the buildings. And did the ground just shake? Everyone was looking around, wondering what just happened.

And it happened again. The lights flickered more. The ground shook again, and more. People in the buildings were going to the windows, trying to find out what was happening.

Right when a gigantic face appeared right in front of one of these buildings, full of offices, facing hundreds of shocked and terrified people, as they faced the several stories high face of Stephanie McMahon smiling at them wide.

"Hi, small people!" she just said.

She had grown to a tremendous 1,000 feet tall. And God, she loved it.

Her heels were holing the streets, breaking through water pipes, turning her footprints into pools. She took another step, looking down to see crowds of ridiculously small people fleeing away with distant screams. She smiled at her reflection in the windows of another building.

"Not bad!" she grinned "Who can stop such a beauty now?"

Behind the windows, she saw the people running for the fire exits. She just grabbed the side of the building, smaller than she was now, and shook. People fell to the floor in complete chaos. She couldn't stop laughing. She was so strong!

What could stop her now?

1543211121.title: The women join Candice for her match

15432111211.content:
It was a hard-fought match between Candice LeRae and Dakota Kai. Candice battled with all her heart, but the distractions and dastardly tactics by Raquel Gonzalez ensured that Dakota always took back the advantage. Unbeknown to everyone in the arena, there were four tiny passengers along for the ride, and they were having a hellish time.

Trapped in Candice's boots, Charlotte Flair, Shayna Baszler, Rhea Ripley and Bianca Belair were being crushed repeatedly. Every bump, every kick, every stomp; Candice's sweaty skin collided with the shrunken women again and again. Even the most hygienic of people don't have pleasant smelling feet, and Candice was no exception. If the constant battering of her toes weren't enough, the foul sweaty odour kept the women gagging and wishing desperately for fresh air that wouldn't come.

Worse than that, all four women were convinced that Candice was deliberately moving her feet as much as possible, to inflict as much torture on her peers as possible. The woman had always seemed such a nice individual. Nobody could have predicted her having such a mean streak. Even Rhea Ripley, a woman who considered Candice a friend, was now at the mercy of the now comparatively giant woman. And at this point, mercy only seemed like a dream.

The sweaty soles flattened the women again and again, in a cruel, never-ending torment.

Eventually the match came to an end, when Raquel Gonzalez distracted the referee long enough for Dakota to kick out of a match-ending pinfall, giving the Kiwi just enough time to recover and surprise Candice with a tight roll-up.

As Candice realised what happened, she wasted little time stomping up the ramp to the backstage area, with all the might she could summon. And if the women imprisoned in her boots thought the impact of the match was punishing enough, they were almost crushed into paste at the crushing force of an angry Candice's feet. By this point the four women were growing hoarse crying out for mercy. At this point they weren't sure if the liquid coating their faces was Candice's foot sweat, or their own tears.

A harsh slam of the locker room door startled the room's lone occupant, who immediately moved to console the Pint Sized Pixie.

"Hey now, Candice," Tegan gently guided the clearly furious woman down to sit beside her on the bench. "We both know that you had that match won, you'll get 'er next time."

Candice closed her eyes and nodded, before she sneakily aimed the size gun at her friend and fired. She opened her eyes just in time to see Tegan's horrified expression as she shrank before Candice's very eyes. Instead of expressing any remorse, Candice just grinned malevolently.

For Candice, she'd realised by now that there was no point of having friendships in the women's locker room. She looked after her fellow women and for what? She was beginning to lose count of the amount of "friends" who had betrayed her. And even those that didn't betray her, she knew that they never appreciated anything she did for them. And if Dakota's behaviour in their match was any indication, playing nice was never going to get her anywhere in such a cruel world. In Candice's eyes, it was her turn to be cruel. And oh boy, was she going to enjoy it.

Candice bent down and plucked the tiny Tegan Nox between her fingers, staring at the miniature Welshwoman. She raised Tegan to her face, watching her struggle in the deliberately tight grip. The comparatively gigantic blonde only laughed evilly at the tiny woman's plight.

"Oh Tegan, I already know I'm going to get Dakota. But since you were here first, I can give you a sneak preview of what's in store for her."

At that moment, the tines in her boots began to struggle with renewed vigour. At their miniature size, their struggles only served to tickle Candice's feet. As the blonde laughed uncontrollably, she waved the tiny Tegan all around. The Welshwoman tried her best not to throw up with motion sickness. Candice gave a hard stomp onto the floor, causing the squirming to cease for the moment.

Candice fixed Tegan with a cold hard stare, causing the terrified Tegan to squirm with discomfort over the giant's gaze. "Now, I already have my boots filled with tiny women, so where should I put you?"

Where does Candice put Tegan?
15432111211.title: Poison Pixie in Defeat Terrorises Tegan

scared women and laughed before saying. "Finally, I have you all where I want you, for so long you all looked
down on me, but now it's my turn", she said happily. All of a sudden Candace heard a voice, it was the voice of

154322111.content:
With no time to waste, Liv dialed the gun up to 10 feet and fired it straight into her stomach. She doubled over as a bizarre and powerful feeling enveloped her, confusing her competitors. As Nia looked down at her, Liv suddenly let out a pleasurable moan and stood up straight, still clutching the gun in her right hand and glowing faintly.

Suddenly, to the horror of the other wrestlers, the blond-haired beauty began to explode outward in size. Her muscular body expanded at a rapid rate, and within moments she had doubled her height to 10’ 6! Opening her eyes, she looked down and laughed triumphantly.

“You all look so small from up here!” she shouted. “There’s practically any competition left now!” she yelled as she swatted Nia aside to demonstrate the truth of her words. It was an easy matter to ensure everyone else stayed down, not that they wanted to face the giantess anyways. With her victory secured, Liv smiled and looked down at herself.

“Damn, I can’t believe that gun really worked, and so well too!” she excitedly thought to herself. “I’m so huge now, and I’ve never felt so strong and energetic! I wonder if it could’ve even enhanced my assets and muscles a bit” she thought, looking down at her chest and then flexing a bicep. “And with this gun… I could have so much more! I can finally beat down everyone else, but why stop there? I could make myself big enough to rule the whole world, not to mention how good that growth would feel…”

At that moment, Liv was the most powerful person on the planet, the only question was would she first flaunt her strength over the other wrestlers, or move straight onto more growth… and maybe global domination?

154322222222222.title: Rhea Ripley?

1543222222222221.content:
Rhea Ripley is in the locker room prepping for a match later on in the night. It looks like finally, after more than a month of waiting, she’ll be able to get her hands on Charlotte Flair. She’s so focused on getting her revenge and possibly her title back in the process… she doesn’t even notice the other woman in the locker room. Alliyah, after months of being overlooked and shuffled around, may finally have a tool to help her get some respect in the locker room. Upon entering the building, she came across this strange remote, promising a BIG impact on anyone who used it. So with a glimmer of hope and confidence, she saunters over to Rhea and stands with her hands on her hips declaring “I think you should give that title shot to me, Ripley.” Rhea just raises an eyebrow and turns her attention over to Alliyah just enough to mutter “The hell’d you say to me?” Alliyah holds the remote up high and says “It’s not fair you should get this opportunity. I’ve been here way longer, i’m way more talented, I deserve it! So tell them you forfeit and you want your title opportunity to go to me instead.” Rhea would laugh if she wasn’t already in such a foul mood, so instead she just stands up and points to the remote in her hands and says “And if i don’t, what are you gonna do? Change the channel in the TV outside? Get the hell out of my face before i shove my fist into yours.” Alliyah’s cheeks go red with frustration and she points the remote in front of her, almost like she was aiming one end right at Rhea’s head. “I warned you. Now you’re going to see just what i’m capable of when this gives me the boost i need!” She presses on the large button towards the top of the remote, and a flash of light fills the room, momentarily blinding Rhea as she holds her hands up to shield her vision. When the light fades, Rhea’s eyes readjust to the light in the room, but to her surprise… she no longer sees Alliyah. She doesn’t see anyone actually. But on the ground where Alliyah was standing, she does see the remote, having clacked against the ground. “Uhh… What?” is all Rhea can say as she steps over towards the remote and bends down to pick it up off the floor. She looks over the strange piece of tech, still not sure exactly what it’s supposed to do, until she sees a small flash of movement. On the remote itself, just near the largest button at the top, she sees what looks like a bug trying to keep it’s balance as she holds it flat in front of her. She leans in to get a closer look and her eyes go wide as she realizes what she’s looking at isn’t a bug at all… it’s Alliyah! Somehow the remote shrunk her down to the size of an ant… less than half an inch tall… and she’s desperately trying to hit the remote again, possibly to undo what she did to herself. All the effort in the world isn't helping though, it seems her shrunken weight is so insignificant that even standing on top of it, she can't push it down.
“WHAT… THE FUCK…” Rhea booms down her exclamation of surprise onto the shrunken girl who has to hold her ears in pain in response. She immediately turns her head towards the sky and falls backwards, screaming her little lungs out. Alliyah doesn’t know how this possibly could have backfired, but now her original target Rhea was an absolute giantess to her, quite literally holding her little life in her hand.

Rhea gives a quick look around to see if anyone else saw this. When the coast seems clear, she narrows her gaze on the shrunken woman and a wicked grin comes across her face. “SO, IS THIS WHAT YOU WERE TRYING TO DO TO ME, YOU LITTLE INSECT? GIVE YOURSELF A 'BOOST' BY MAKING ME TINY? WELL IT LOOKS LIKE YOU SCREWED THAT UP PRETTY BAD!” Alliyah has dropped to her hands and knees at this point, begging Rhea for forgiveness and pleading with her to change her back. Unfortunately it’s falling on deaf ears as Alliyah is just too small for her shrunken voice to carry, and all Rhea can hear is a high pitched squeak. Bringing the remote closer to her eyes, Rhea is able to see the controls and understands the power she holds in her hands. She focuses back on the insignificant bug balancing on the device and says “YOU’RE TOO DAMN LITTLE FOR ME TO HEAR, AND I DON’T REALLY WANT TO LISTEN TO ANYTHING YOU HAVE TO SAY ANYWAY. SO JUST NOD YES OR NO FOR ME. THIS REMOTE… IS IT YOURS?” The tiny girl tries to maintain her balance and composure as she floats in a midair platform, and just shakes her head wildly from side to side. “WELL IF IT’S NOT YOURS, DO YOU AT LEAST NO WHERE IT CAME FROM?” Once again, the shrunken woman shakes her head and says up at Rhea “It… It was here when i got here! I swear!” Rhea’s massive eyes roll in response to Alliyah’s answers and she just says “WELL THEN YOU’RE USELESS TO ME.” Rhea lowers the remote slightly, giving Alliyah a short tour of Rhea’s face, from her beautiful pale blue eyes, to the long slope of her nose, and finally ending at her pouty lips. Alliyah’s blood runs cold as she sees Rhea take a small inhale, before pursing her lips and blowing a hurricane-force breathe onto the insect sized girl. In an instant Alliyah is blown completely off of the remote, and lands elsewhere in the locker room, outside of Rhea’s vision. Rhea doesn’t even give it a second thought wondering if she landed safely or not. She does however give the remote a good look over, to see exactly what went wrong for Alliyah.
